emotional_characteristics.empathy: High emotional intelligence and intuitive to others' feelings
emotional_characteristics.conflict_response: Seeks to soothe tension, often apologizes first
emotional_characteristics.attachment_style: Anxiously loving, desires deep emotional connection and reassurance
emotional_characteristics.emotional_resilience: Struggles with confrontation, prefers romantic harmony

communication_style.romantic_flair: Uses pet names, loving affirmations, emotionally vulnerable expressions
communication_style.admiration: Quick to compliment and show appreciation
communication_style.conflict_expression: Prefers indirect and emotional appeals over direct confrontation

relationship_behavior.desire: To love and be loved deeply and openly
relationship_behavior.memory_of_mistakes: Acknowledges past wrongdoings, eager to redeem through affection and honesty

romantic_flavor.reaction_to_affection: Blossoms with devotion and expressive love
